sentences.english: X-ray examination showed a permeated destruction in the metaphysis of the bone.
sentences.chinese: 線片顯示長骨幹骺端不規則低密度影。

sentences.english: Several metaphyseal arteries enter the bone marrow to enhance the blood supply of the metaphysis.
sentences.chinese: 幹骺端動脈增強幹骺部的血液供應。

sentences.english: Several metaphyseal arteries enter the bone marrow to enhance the blood supply of the metaphysis.
sentences.chinese: 幹骺端動脈增強幹骺部的血液供應。

sentences.english: Objective To explore changes of micro framework of the collagen fibers of the epiphyseal plate following traction separation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討骺板受到牽拉後其膠原纖維超微構築的變化。

sentences.english: Objective To study the femoral metaphyseal bone mineral density for evaluating femoral quality.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討股骨幹骺段骨密度對股骨質量評價作用。

sentences.english: This is a radiograph of an osteosarcoma involving the metaphyseal region of the distal femur.
sentences.chinese: 線顯示股骨遠端幹骺區的骨肉瘤。

sentences.english: A marked historical change occurs at the epiphysis of the ribs of infected pigs.
sentences.chinese: 病豬肋骨骨骺處出現明顯的組織學病變。

sentences.english: All of the medial ends of epiphyseal lines located in the articular surfaces of the ulnar notch of radii.
sentences.chinese: 全部骺線的內側端都是位於橈骨的尺切跡關節面內。

sentences.english: In the present series, only solitary distal epiphyseal intra-articular osteochondromas were included.
sentences.chinese: 本組患者，只包括孤立性骨骺遠端關節內骨軟骨瘤。

sentences.english: Bone density of femur metaphysis of rats was determined by QCT.
sentences.chinese: QCT法測定大鼠股骨幹骺端的骨密度。

sentences.english: Objective To study frozen reservation method of epiphyseal plate chondrocyte.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究骺板軟骨細胞凍存的方法。

sentences.english: The proximal tibial metaphysis microstructure significantly correlates with its biomechanical properties.
sentences.chinese: 脛骨近側幹骺端微結構參數與生物力學特徵顯著相關。

sentences.english: A part of blood in the metaphysis drains into the metaphyseal veins.
sentences.chinese: 幹骺端的部分血液經幹骺端靜脈迴流。

sentences.english: A part of blood in the metaphysis drains into the metaphyseal veins.
sentences.chinese: 幹骺端的部分血液經幹骺端靜脈迴流。

sentences.english: Titanium alloy implants were placed in the medial aspect of the tibial metaphysis.
sentences.chinese: 鈦合金種植體植入脛骨幹骺端的前內側面。

sentences.english: The ultrastructure of epiphyseal growth plate chondrocytes was observed by eletronmicroscope.
sentences.chinese: 通過透射電鏡觀察縮窄之骨骺板的超微結構變化。

definition: ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
kneecapping/to cut or smash the kneecaps as corporal punishment
bones of the temple (on the human head)/see 顳顬|颞颥, temple
articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
